[LanguageSimilarityMatcher](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagesimilaritymatcher.md)


</td><td>

Helper to compare two language tags to determine how closely related they are, applying normalization and language semantics as appropriate.


</td></tr>

[LanguageTag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md)


</td><td>

Represents a single BCP-47 language tag.

## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[choose(desired, available, options)](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.choose.md)


</td><td>

Matches a list of desired [languages](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md) to a list of available [languages](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md)<!-- -->, return a list of matching languages ordered from best to worst.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[similarity(t1, t2, options)](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.similarity.md)


</td><td>

Determine how similar two language tags are to each other.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[subtagsToString(subtags)](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.subtagstostring.md)


</td><td>

Converts [subtags](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.subtags.md) to a string.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[tag(from, options)](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.tag.md)


</td><td>

Creates a new [language tag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md) from a [language specifier](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md)

The supplied initializer must be at least [well-formed according to RFC 5646](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc5646.html#section-2.2.9)<!-- -->. Higher degrees of validation along with any normalizations may be optionally specified.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[tags(from, options)](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.tags.md)


</td><td>

Creates an array of [language tags](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md) from an incoming array of [language specifiers](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

[LanguageSpec](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md)

Any of the possible ways to represent a language - as a `string`<!-- -->, parsed [subtags](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.subtags.md) or an instantiated [language tag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

Describes the degree of normalization of a language tag.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[TagSimilarity](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.tagsimilarity.md)


</td><td>

Numeric representation of the quality of a language match. Range is 0 (no match) to 1 (exact match).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[TagValidity](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.tagvalidity.md)


</td><td>

Describes the validation level of a particular tag.


</td></tr>
